name: Calendar Event
description: Create a calendar event from voice commands

promptTemplates.extract:
Extract calendar event parameters from the voice command.
Required fields:
- eventTitle: title of the event
- startDateTimeISO8601: event start time in strict ISO8601 format

Optional fields:
- durationMinutes: event duration in minutes (default 60)
- notes: optional details

Current local time: {{nowISO8601}}
Current timezone: {{currentTimeZone}}

Rules:
1. Resolve relative times using the current local time.
2. startDateTimeISO8601 must be a concrete date-time, e.g. 2026-02-17T15:00:00-08:00
3. Output ONLY valid JSON. No markdown, no comments.

Example output:
{"eventTitle":"Team review","startDateTimeISO8601":"2026-02-17T15:00:00-08:00","durationMinutes":"60"}
